vote.text: Amendment SA 2915 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2915 proposed by Senator McConnell for Senator Alexander to Amendment SA 2910. (consideration: CR S4333; text: CR S4333) To make a technical correction.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2915 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
